contracts.description: Information related to existing credit card contracts.

availablebalance.description: The available balance on this contract.

contractclass.description: The type of contract. For example, "ONEYEAR,"

maxamount.description: The maximum allowed amount for this contract.

providergroupid.description: Athena ID for this financial group.

departmentlist.description: Comma separated list of department IDs that belong to this group

cleanbalance.description: Indicates whether the balance is associated with a contract, payment plan, or collections agency.

collectionsbalance.description: The outstanding amount associated with a collections agency.

paymentplanbalance.description: The outstanding amount associated with a payment plan.
